Flow.description: Verbiage changes and added dynamic train arrival question
Flow.label: Flight Submission Form

fields.name: Do_you_have_any_additional_information_you_would_like_to_share_with_the_team_reg
fields.fieldText: Do you have any additional information you would like to share with our Onsite Team regarding your flight and travel plans?

fields.name: Other_Program_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Please complete the following flight form with your arrival and departure information.

Verto's Onsite Team will use this information to arrange your airport pick-up and transfer you to your housing accommodations when you arrive! Reach out to your Student Onboarding Advisor if you have any questions.


Please add your departing flight information below. Start with your flight from your home destination to your program destination.

fields.name: CostaRica_Instructions
fields.fieldText: Your flight window for Costa Rica is January 24: 12:00pm-8:00pm local time

fields.name: Display_Upload_Itinerary_Instructions
fields.fieldText:
Please upload copies of your flight itinerary.


When you see a green check box in the prompt window, the file has successfully uploaded. You will not see the files on the screen underneath.
